titleInfo.title: CMA Music Festival's official vehicle: Chevrolet (yellow/red)

mods.abstract: Three color window card (brown, red and yellow on white) announcing the official vehicle of the CMA Music Festival, the Chevrolet. Poster features a woodcut of a truck.
